sections.heading: Act; exclusive means of judicial review
sections.text: Except as otherwise provided by law, the Administrative Procedure Act establishes the exclusive means of judicial review of a final decision of any agency in a contested case.SourceLaws 1963, c. 531, ยง 3, p. 1666;Laws 1987, LB 253, ยง 21;Laws 1988, LB 352, ยง 18
